Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util

Class ChunkPillarUnloadTimer

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util.ChunkUnloadTimer
com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util.ChunkPillarUnloadTimer
public class ChunkPillarUnloadTimer extends ChunkUnloadTimer
Chunk-Pillar variant of ChunkUnloadTimer, for keeping track of chunk-pillars.
